item.description:
We have one company already signed-up to present at the January meetup - uTest
We're actually using their innovative 'crowd source' QA here at Aprigo, so this should be an interesting talk.
I'm open for suggestions as far as the 2nd presenter for the evening.

2nd presenter of the night is Jim Geisman, who will talk about how to price a SaaS / Cloud offering. Jim is well known in this industry and I personally had the pleasure of listening to his presentations in multiple SaaS/Cloud based industry events.

Regards,
Tsahy.

group.name: Boston Cloud Services - All things Cloud, SaaS, PaaS, XaaS

item.name: January Boston Cloud Services Meetup
